attributes.action: Prevent Israeli officials from taking part in  the official HMD ceremonies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Israeli carnage in Gaza is a moral outrage and an affront to the lessons of the Holocaust and the message of Holocaust Memorial Day.
We demand, therefore, that no Israeli official be invited to take part in any of the official Holocaust Memorial Day ceremonies.

rejection.details: This event is organised by the Holocaust Educational Trust.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
